name: manage-git-worktrees
title: Manage Git Worktrees
description: Dead simple extension to manage Git Worktrees. For now only helps with viewing worktrees & opening worktrees.
author: utopyin

preferences.name: repositories
preferences.title: Repositories
preferences.description: Absolute or ~ paths to git repositories. Separate paths with commas.

preferences.name: defaultIDE
preferences.title: Default IDE
preferences.description: Application used by the Open in IDE action.

preferences.name: defaultTerminal
preferences.title: Default Terminal
preferences.description: Application used by the Open in Terminal action.

commands.name: view-worktrees
commands.title: View Git Worktrees
commands.description: List all worktrees from configured repositories. Open worktrees in IDE or Terminal, or copy the path to clipboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
